Some years ago, one of my colleagues was doing a tour...
...when one of the members of his tour, a young man, fell down,...
...but when the man got up, he was actually looking quite angry.
When asked how he was, he said he would have been okay...
...if someone hadn't just walked through him.
One of the most famous stories about Dover Castle is that of our drummer boy,...
And from time to time over the centuries,...
...his form has been seen walking along the battlements...
...and more often a drumming sound foretelling war.
Discover the darker side of history this Halloween.
